CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Zenith Tech Library relative to Silverhaven Digital Repository?
SRP.A: Zenith Tech Library is {below} Silverhaven Digital Repository in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Silverhaven Digital Repository relative to Meridian Academy Collection?
SRP.A: Silverhaven Digital Repository is {above} Meridian Academy Collection in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Zenith Tech Library relative to Celestial College Archives?
SRP.A: Zenith Tech Library is {below} Celestial College Archives in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total library visits?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Meridian Academy Collection}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total library visits?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Arcane University Library}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Silverhaven Digital Repository's minimum Library Visits in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Silverhaven Digital Repository's minimum Library Visits is in {1992}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Borealis Research Hub's maximum Library Visits in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Borealis Research Hub's maximum Library Visits is in {1995}.

NC.Q: Was the total Library Visits in 1993 higher or lower than in 1997?
NC.A: The total library visits in 1993 was {higher} than in 1997.

NC.Q: Was the total Library Visits in 1993 higher or lower than in 1995?
NC.A: The total library visits in 1993 was {lower} than in 1995.

NC.Q: Was the total Library Visits in 1989 higher or lower than in 1990?
NC.A: The total library visits in 1989 was {lower} than in 1990.

NC.Q: Between 1988 and 1989, was the average total Library Visits higher or lower than between 1988 and 1994?
NC.A: The average total library visits between 1988 and 1989 was {higher} than between 1988 and 1994.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Meridian Academy Collection} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Zenith Tech Library and Meridian Academy Collection first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Zenith Tech Library and Meridian Academy Collection first exchanged leading positions in {1989}.
